name: For flow, a declared link’s name MUST be unique among all link names defined within the same immediately enclosing flow.
description: For flow, a declared link’s name MUST be unique among all link names defined within the same immediately enclosing flow.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Compatible with CISQ 18 and especially ASCCSM-CWE-835
remediation: For flow, a declared link’s name MUST be unique among all link names defined within the same immediately enclosing flow.
